Negative_Review: I booked a suites room and a double room we asked to be connected because we have 3 children of which one disabled Of course we did not have rooms connected or the possibility to changing them At the reception they blamed the booking although I asked them in writing Because I could not leave children alone I slept with the children in the suite and the husband alone The couch is terrible It s impossible to sleep on it You can not ask for a lot of money on a suite and offer a very incomfortable sleeping couch By far the biggest Disappointment was the Breakfast which even though it was free was not good for hotel claims and the parking There was no parking for the wheelchair and in the garage the car did not fit because the maximum was 2 m At a hotel with such claims and prices I expect something else
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location for VIC meetings Amazing value for money Cheerful friendly staff Rooms and facilities are well designed and everything works perfectly

Negative_Review: Getting the room only at 2pm is inconvenient for those that get in early in the morning Breakfast is too expensive
Positive_Review: Perfect place to stay for business at VIC Hotel is cheerful efficient reliable and terrific value for money

Negative_Review: Pillows are too soft and don t provide proper support Didn t offer soap bars it was all liquid attached to the walls
Positive_Review: Afternoon treats mini souffle and coffee machine quality Buffet breakfast Staff was professional

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is ideal for meetings at UN Then there is the bus directly to the Airport The hotel has all you need great breakfast also outside friendly and fast staff fast internet and seemingly a predominance of alpha male guests

Negative_Review: The tv and the channels are so poor selected the hotel is in front of UN so more international channel should be available but the fact was only 3 channels in English which were for news no English Channels for movies or documentary also there was one bottle of water complementary the rest of days u have to pay
Positive_Review: Rooms are clean

Negative_Review: That there was no a la carte option for breakfast in the restaurant
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent and nothing was too much trouble location was also excellent easy access to the U train system overall perfect My family and I will no doubt stay here again if we visit Vienna

Negative_Review: I could not remember of anything that would really bother me Maybe only I had a feeling that staff at the reception desk is not interested in their work and consequently lack of hospitality was in the air
Positive_Review: In particular location since I ve had meetings at Tech Gate Vienna accesability Bus transfer from Vienna Airport stops infront of hotel clean room

Negative_Review: Reception not helpful Awfully expensive for what they offer
Positive_Review: Space in the room Excellent complimentary coffee when I did not have to ask where it is

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: placement is perfect easy to get by car 5 stops by subway and you are on Stefan Platz 2 stops in opposite direction and you are at Donnau Zentrum large shopping mall

Negative_Review: Expensive parking
Positive_Review: Clean room comfortable beds Very easy to find the hotel Nice breakfast Very friendly staff Metro is two minutes from hotel and it is very easy to get to the city center very quickly Close to Danube

Negative_Review: 1 No wardrobe in a suite 2 Nowhere to hang clothes at night 3 Pillows were so soft as to be useless even six were not enough 4 Always having to log into the internet even with a four day stay 5 Having to ask for the in room breakfast menu and one morning they forgot to pick it up 6 Lack of staff at the reception desk queues of five or even ten minutes the norm 7 The doorstop conveniently placed to ensure excruciating toe stub almost every time we used the hooks that passed for the wardrobe 8 Single duvets for a double bed 9 No security at the entrance to the hotel anyone could walk in off the street with or without a reservation 10 Even worse the so called executive floor could be accessed by anyone entering the lift 11 Our fault for not checking but anyone expecting enticing streets and cafes in the vicinity of this hotel will disappointed the surrounding architecture is mostly concrete blocks almost neo Stalinist in design with the building itself fronting busy dual carriageways on two sides and a railway line nearby
Positive_Review: Bathrooms in our suite were good Abundant breakfast one enough for two

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I stayed only 1 night and didn t have breakfast or test any of the facilities other than the room but the location is very practical and the hotel was great value for the money The minibar was included in the room category rate which was a nice extra

Negative_Review: We got charged for a drink from the mini bar after explicitly stating that nothing has been used from it and really nothing was used Parking in the hotel was paid 22 euros PER DAY This is simply unacceptable for a guest in your own hotel since normal parking is around 10 13 euros in the neighborhood No slippers in the room no big towels The safe in the room jammed and we couldn t get out the stuff we needed until the morning after Dinner was extremely overpriced
Positive_Review: The staff was helpful though misleading at times

Negative_Review: The computer in the business center in German language and I needed modified my power point presentation but the program was blocked I expected to have the famous Vienna coffee in the breakfast but we had every morning terrible cold coffee they clean the drinking glasses with chemicals detergent and not to wash with water the steam and sauna room mixed they need only to make different timing for male and female and time for both so can make every body happy
Positive_Review: Clean and tidy breakfast with different varieties Excellent location helpful staff

Negative_Review: Pricey for what it is No toothbrush or razor in room Have to ask and collect by urself at from reception No iron in room but there s a communal one on floor A bit of hassle
Positive_Review: Great location for Austria centre Airport bus drops u right outside hotel Nice breakfast and good room service options

Negative_Review: One Sauna wasn t working and also the Wii room was out of order
Positive_Review: I had a reservation for executive room executive lounge room access The friendly stuff did upgrade me for free to superior room and let me check in 4 hours in advance without any extra fees

Negative_Review: the breakfast was not managed well A personal has a problem with cleaning tables Not enough chairs But later they solved
Positive_Review: close to U bahn Parking in Garage

Negative_Review: When I arrived at my next destination I realized that some items had been removed from my suitcase while I was away from the hotel dispite the fact that I had the do nodt disturb sign on my door for the dudration of my 4 day stay I thought that perhaps I hadn t packed them however when I arrived home I realized that indeed the items that were brand new still in their packaging went missing Unfortunately I have learned that all items need to be locked up whenever I leave the room
Positive_Review: Almost everything

Negative_Review: For a long stay i had to ask for new login user name and password for WIFI every 3 days No iron and ironing board in the room
Positive_Review: Convenience of location Friendly and helpful staff

Negative_Review: Breakfast was terrible and the room was warn out
Positive_Review: Location was great for ACV and VIC and good for getting to the town center The area itself was very boring

Negative_Review: It was a bit further out from the center Not too bad about a 15 taxi
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel bar and the beds were clean The shower was great and had very strong pressure

Negative_Review: The wifi was down for a day and i kept getting logged out the other days but when it worked it worked good The login page for the wifi was also kind of confusing but the staff helped
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy and my room was clean and big It s not in the city centre but there is a subway close by that takes you there in like 10 min The breakfast was good and the staff was very helpful and friendly I was there for a conference in the Vienna Centre and for that it was an excellent location just a 5 minute walk There was a huge shopping center just 2 stops away with the subway so you dont have to go far to get stuff

Negative_Review: Wifi was not working on my phone which meant I did not have access to communication for 3 days Calling from the hotel was exorbitant and I chose not to use the facility
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly from reception restuarant to housekeeping

Negative_Review: I expected to be able to use the Wellness and Sport facilities however during to an even they closed it exactly during the whole length of my stay with no notice I saw it suddenly in the elevator written in small and between some other advertisement regarding the event which I was not interested so I really saw the notice by chance I think they should have given some discount as the facilities were not available and people could have then chosen another place to stay
Positive_Review: I was there for a conference at the Austria Center so it was really good location for me Also 3 minutes from the U bahn so wherever you d like to go it s easy Breakfast was also good as well as the room and bathroom were clean The hotel is going towards sustainable behaviors so that was also good

Negative_Review: Duvet was too thin One very small and one small normal towel is not what one expects in a four star hotel Rooms could do with an overhaul more plugs etc
Positive_Review: Staff was quick to bring slippers extra duvet duvet was very thin and extra towels Bottles of water very nice their taxi driver was prompt to take us around and they aloud late check in Food from room service was excellent although very pricey

Negative_Review: Entrance to the executive lounge I arrived around 8h50 and styed in room 427 I had no permission to the lounge with my room cart
Positive_Review: Ontvangst en het uitgebreide buffet

Negative_Review: Welcome by staff at the reception a bit unfriendly Strange position of the bed in the middle of the room night stand behind the bed toilet separate from the bathroom no sink to was hands in the toilet room had to go from one side of the room to the other to wash hands Water bottle on the table costing 5 60 euro but the price tag was towards the wall not visible at first Many hotels offer a bottle of water for free with the message with compliments I assumed it was the same and saw the price after I opened it that was an unpleasant surprise wifi not reliable disconnecting and having to login again all the time location was not perfect but it was the closest I could find for the place where I had the event I was attending to I regret not having chosen a hotel in the center and just taking a taxi for getting to the event place there is nothing to see around it feeling cold in the room in spite of putting the air conditioning to a warmer temperature
Positive_Review: Warming Infrared light in the bathroom very close to a metro line

Negative_Review: Everything good
Positive_Review: Good location The metro station just in front of Few stops till city center Good breakfast The room is very clean The parking is inside the building

Negative_Review: Wi fi is TERRIBLE and it needs to be fixed quickly before some mad guest does something horrible The area by the hotel is quite empty no grocery store no restaurant only a little pastry shop by the metro station but it s a minor detail
Positive_Review: We travelled with 2 kids and booked a family room which was perfect for our needs We liked breakfast a lot and access to the executive lounge with free snacks and beverages very convinient with kids There is a nice playground and a great park with a lake by the hotel Donauinsel Vienna s island with several playgrounds is just one metro station away from the hotel

Negative_Review: Advanced payment problems ineptitude with bank card processing I had to ask bank to relax security for this transaction Wired deposit 50 Euro day for already prepaid stay Inadequate information about what is included in the price
Positive_Review: Location near metro Spacious clean room Cosy beds Good value for money with promo

Negative_Review: The breakfast dishes need to be improved because there wasn t variaty Every day was the same and that was a little bit frustrating because the kids complained about it
Positive_Review: Great place We stayed for 3 nights here and we loved it We booked the suite at the executive floor and it was very nice 2 large rooms mini bar and very clean

Negative_Review: air condition was not really cooling and some of the reception staff were not friendly and to some extend were a bit rude
Positive_Review: size of family room was great

Negative_Review: Breakfast was quite poor staying there for 7 nights and having the same breakfast every day was not the most pleasant thing
Positive_Review: Everything was just great

Negative_Review: lady on a reception desk she was not polite
Positive_Review: almost everything special thanks to Mr Senad from reception extremely helpful and polite young man

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff Comfortable clean room across from the metro but it appears some stairs need to be accessed if you are arriving from the metro Quiet area near parks and lake

Negative_Review: Although we had prepaid the full amount to the hotel as soon as we got there we were asked to deposit another eur 50 day for the extras we found this amount to be outrageous considering the cost of the hotel was eur 85 day Also even though our bed sheets were changed the staff forgot to change our pillow cases through out our stay Furthermore we asked the hotel to bring us double bed coverings but they told us that it was not possible In addition the hotel needs to upgrade it s computers as we had a really hard time getting them to work
Positive_Review: We liked the location of the hotel as there was direct transfer to the downtown area The staff was also friendly

Negative_Review: we were offered an upgrade to an executive room together with access to mini bar waste of money no upgrade it would have been cheaper to pay for mini bar us age
Positive_Review: we were going on a river cruise the location was perfect love prater which is also very close

Negative_Review: Breakfast was too expensive
Positive_Review: Good location not too far from city center but at the same time not too central Large comfortable room Good breakfast options

Negative_Review: The view was not amazing from top floor The view was more of the rooms in front of us The shower in the double room was open so make sure the second person is your partner
Positive_Review: The rooms were spacious and all in all it was a nice hotel

Negative_Review: I checked out on Sunday and needed a bit help with luggage But reception desk told me that they can provide the cart but I have to do it myself as on Sunday there s no bell desk service
Positive_Review: The upgrade to executive apartment for 20 euros a night was really a good deal Huge room and free mini bar consumption Definitely recommend it if you are traveling with family

Negative_Review: the staff was not friendly at the reception they did not bother to give the correct invoice with the right information on it even if i asked twice i received twice a wrong document due to carelessness the hotel did not have large blankets only small single ones i was not informed for the sauna and other facilities available free of charge during the check in
Positive_Review: the location was close to the VIC where the business meetings were held the hotel was next to the metro station and next to a bus station with direct connection to the airport

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was doing business at the UN center and this hotel is right across the street from it Also across the street is a subway station and a pharmacy Down the street is a neighborhood grocery store Nothing much else in this neighborhood but for UN business the location is excellent

Negative_Review: The quantity of food at the breakfast buffet was amazing There were 3 different types of eggs which was amazing However they tasted horrendous Instead of serving the cheapest eggs prepared in 3 different forms the quality should be tested especially in a 4 star quality Quality over quantity please
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable Facilities great Staff polite and helpful Underground across the street Breakfast buffet huge something for everyone

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff at desk bar and restaurant were very nice and friendly Hotel d cor is a little outdated but does not look shabby or worn Even though located outside of old town a subway stop is conveniently located across the street along with an airport bus stop No complaints about the room Clean and quiet

Negative_Review: I upgraded to an executive suite which was a bit small This allowed free use of the mini bar which had a very small selection This was never fully restocked even though I requested it be replenished daily Turn down service only occurred twice in 5 nights Hotel was fine otherwise but the service was poor
Positive_Review: Excellent location

Negative_Review: modest minibar we need more that 1 one coca cola
Positive_Review: Nice apartament coffee and Nespresso 2 tv sets with enough english posts very clean spacious bathroom Subway just in front of hotel 3 station to Prater 6 to Stephansplatz Station for airport bus in front of hotel

Negative_Review: Parking price
Positive_Review: Good location 10 minutes by subway from downtown Vienna It has a parking but can be a bit costly with 21 euros day Clean rooms breakfast was very good

Negative_Review: Only negative things is that it say that there is a fitness but the fitness was actually just 2 runways and 1 bicycle But there is 3 different sounas which compensate everything
Positive_Review: This hotel is absolutelly great Not expensive at all for the quality they provide The staff is super super nice and helpful excluding 1 always grumpy girl on reception and the cleanliness is superb The rooms are big and very comfortable Bed as well really comfortable Location is perfect the airport bus stops exactly in front of the enters of the hotel and a cross the street is the subway which leads you exactly to the main street iin the center We were extreamly happy with our stay in this hotel Highly recommend it

Negative_Review: At our arrival 8 PM the room was set up as a single and the receptionist said that in a few minutes someone will bring the missing stuff After 4 hours we need to call again the reception because nothing was done
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I booked a double room and requested a quiet room but the first room that we were given was a twin room So we asked for a room change and were given a double room however this room was a quite noisy as it was in front of the elevators and also because there was a group of guests nearby who were noisy So we again asked for a room change and finally settled into a quiet double room The staff members were very nice but it d have been better if my requests were actually met from the beginning Nonetheless I would highly recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: The location is great for not only for some who has something to do with the UN but also for regular travellers because the hotel is right next to the bus stop where airport bus arrives and is also across the road from U1 subway line The main tourist attractions e g Stephansplatz Karlsplatz etc are only 10 15 minutes by subway Breakfast was also really good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: First of all gorgeous breakfast very broad choice furthermore good location to subway just across the street very comfortable a stylish environment 100 to recommend not only for younger also for older and demanding couple

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location on one of the Airport Bus drop off points and right next to UN building Easy to get into Stephanplatz and central Vienna as there is a U stop opposite and it takes just over 5 minutes Friendly atmosphere comfy beds Overall had a great stay

Negative_Review: Internet worked badly kept loosing connection and had to re log in every 5 min it was annoying Brekfast for 22 is a rip off Insane I took breakfast at VIC for 5 Pillows are a bit too flat and not firm enough Room was a bit cold AC worked but didnt seem to make a difference
Positive_Review: Location across the Street from VIC where I had my 3 day meeting Clean modern beautiful design large bathroom with the view on the river Free tea coffee in the room

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location is somewhere in the middle of the city so it was quite convenient to get to both ends for business outside of the city and leisure down town A direct shuttle bus from the airport right to the hotel door was definitely a big advantage A pleasant surprise were apples left in the room on daily basis Breakfast was very good with big variety of choices in a cosy environment of the restaurant Escalator was always available though there were many guests

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The breakfast was amazing Facilities is really nice sauna gym rooms for Wii games and a chance to go on a rooftop almost to enjoy the view Recommend for travelers with a car

Negative_Review: I realized that the shampoo liquid soap container was empty when I was at the shower Already wet I had to got out twice to the sink to collect some liquid soap in my hands and go back to the shower

Positive_Review: Walking distance from the Convention Center
